mng: self, oneself, sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1], sixth in order, letter "F" or roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc, hexa

exm.mng: self, oneself, sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1], sixth in order, letter "F" or roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc, hexa
know yourself, know your enemy (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3])
to know oneself, to be intimate or close, intimate friend
to do (sth) oneself, to help oneself to
without the freedom to act independently (idiom); involuntary, not of one's own volition, in spite of oneself
to express oneself, to give an account of oneself, to project oneself, to show off
those on our side, ourselves, one's own people, one of us
twenty sixth year F2 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 2009 or 2069
to take for one's own, to expropriate
